reviews.text: Fantastic pizza and pasta. Owner took my order, brought it to me, awesome service and conversation. Definitely will be back. Thanks for the great meal!
No need to look further. This is the real deal! Thank you.
Brandon was outstanding!  Such a great person.  Made the night fantastic.

Quintessential  New York slice
My wife ordered a Caesar salad as an add on. We knew it was a gamble, but it was an absolute home run
Good place good food nice people

last place we checked out before heading to the airport was this pizza place recommended by our airbnb host as some of the best pizza in the city and it definitely lived up to that title! we tried thecheese and buffalo slices which were both great, everything made fresh. the owner Louie is really friendly and makes every customer feel like family, its clear why this place is so popular.

Service was amazing they were so kind and took my order the moment I entered the area although there was still a lot of other people. Their service was amazing also because of they speak to you in a gentle tone. And we CANNOT forget that they are a hero for saving that couple life. The food was pretty good it had flavor even though most take out places I been to lacked flavor because it got cold but when I ordered take out the food was not only flavorful but it was hot. And I donâ€™t really like pizza but this store pizza was DELICIOUS I will definitely be coming back.
Short walk from the train. Bangin' food. Price is good. Dude that runs the place is super cool.

The Best slices of Hawaiian, cheese and pepperoni pizza I've ever had, NY pizza here is all the hype and this Location does NOT disappoint.
I'm definitely coming here again if ever back in town. They're brother hood here with the chefs working to make fresh pizzas etc . Man this location is what it's about to be family friendly! The broccoli Pinwheel is freaking delicious with the sauce! Get the sauce...

Rib eye steak with potatoes and carrots are amazing. Chicken Marsala, Penne, their entire menu is delicious!!!! Louie and the guys are awesome!!! A true Stapleton in the community! Thank you for taking care of BadMF ğŸ˜‰ and family.
My first time in New York City, just googled pizza places after getting off a plane from Athens and went to Louieâ€™s it was great all around and if Iâ€™m ever back Iâ€™ll go again
Awesome
Absolute gas
Best pizza ever!!!! Ohh and buffalo wings.. you have to try....  won't disappoint
The grandma slice is top best slices Iâ€™ve had in NYC, all the food here is great including the grilled chicken with veggies or penne alla vodka, a true neighborhood gem!!
The best Grama pie and steak ğŸ¥©
Neighborhood gem. Incredible value and care taken on the food this restaurant serves.  I hope this place continues being a staple in the community. Not many places like this left.
pizza is always great. other dishes as well. great day when they opened in the neighborhood

I visited Louis Pizza today with my wife and daughter after seeing the great reviewsâ€”and they were spot on! The flavor was amazing, and the staff was very friendly and welcoming. Highly recommended!

I'm an old school Italian who grew up in Brooklyn.  So when I tell you that Louie's is an authentic throw back to the pizza places and Italian restaurants I've spent my entire life going to, please believe me!

The food is absolutely amazing,  Try the chicken roll and see if you can finish eating it in one sitting! lol  Now that I've just discovered this place I plan on trying everything on the menu eventually.  Thank you, Louie!  You're a great guy and it's evident that you put your heart and soul into your job and restaurant!
Legend
Amazing people! Great Food! Definitely the best pizzeria in Elmhurst
My Friday lunch spot, good pizza, probably the best in the neighborhood.

Super friendly service. The guy taking our order was personable and upbeat making us feel very comfortable and welcome. The pizza was outstanding. We ordered a whole pizza and it was so good we ended up eating the whole thing and that is something considering the size of the pizza was huge!
Amazing ! And very cool guy that owns it ğŸ’ªğŸ½ highly recommended ğŸ’«

The best  food!!!
Forever

The whole meal from drinks to dessert was handled well. This restaurant provides expected value for money. Their flavor combinations work perfectly! The service personnel showed remarkable consistency from start to finish. When in the area, this spot is reliable.
Son un poco caras pero son buenas la pasta es excelente ğŸ‘Œ
Great place friendly owner

THE best overall experience of any pizza place I've ever been in! The owner was so gracious and polite, he really put out a welcome vibe that made my daughter and I very excited to have chosen his pizzeria to have our dinner. My daughter chose classic pepperoni, while I chose the Grandma and we were both totally blown away!!! Absolutely the best pizza I've had, ever. I enjoyed it so much, I took four additional slices home. I was fortunate enough to spend a little bit of time speaking with the owner, Louie, and just left feeling like I had a great experience. I cannot recommend Louie's pizzeria enough!!! AAA+++
This place is worth your money.
Best pizza in Jackson Heights and Elmhurst.
i like this place because of the pizza and people

We ordered rib eye steak and grandma slice
The steak - so juicy and tender
The potatos and carrots  - yummmmmm
my friend and I shared both of them and we are very satisfied ğŸ˜‹ will definitely come back when we get the chance
We were a bit surprised that there were so many people even it was 3pm in the afternoon, tells you how popular it is and I am glad we made a good choice ğŸ˜
Very good local pizza and their chicken wings was amazing!!
My favorite place to eat in NYC. High quality Italian at a great price. Friendly staff that takes care of their guests. 11/10.

Iâ€™ve eaten at Louieâ€™s more times than I can count, and it never disappoints. The food is reaallly good. Every bite just hits. Grandma slice ğŸ¤ŒğŸ»ğŸ¤ŒğŸ»ğŸ¤ŒğŸ»

The ownerâ€™s a total gemâ€”funny, down to earth, and always makes you feel like you belong there. Itâ€™s one of those spots that just gets it. IYKYK ğŸ˜
The owner is so rude
Good stuff ğŸ’ªğŸ½
Louieâ€™s Pizza is incredibly delicious and easily the best in New York. Way better than Joeâ€™s. If you havenâ€™t tried it yet, youâ€™re missing out!
What an awesome spot. Owner is so kind and talked to us quite a bit. Pizza and pinwheels were delicious. It was obvious that they have a lot of local regulars, and I can see why.
A plus.  Best in town
La mejor pizza de NY en los 4000kms que nos separan! Volveremos pronto. Gracias Louieâ€™s
Amazing, amazing dishes!!! I enjoyed my dinner there. Great food and great owners!
Great pizza. Old school new York pizzeria. Service is excellent. Best pizza in the surrounding neighborhoods.
great pizza without a doubt.
If you're hopping from JFK to LaGuardia and have some time to get your NY pizza fix this place should do the trick!
Best pizza in the area but the star of the show is the eggplant parm hero.  Even better than the excellent weekly special at Leo's Latticini Mamas in Corona.

Didn't feel well after two regular slices ğŸ˜ğŸ˜­

The cheese did not agree with my system apparently
when i think classic nyc pizza - itâ€™s louieâ€™s. perfect crust, quality toppings and straight forward service. a neighborhood staple that never disappoints.

The counter staff was welcoming, and I was surprised that my double stroller fit inside. It was a convenient location to grab a slice before my doctor's appointment. I enjoyed a cheese slice with red plum juice, and my little pizza connoisseur daughters also enjoyed her slice.

Best, most consistent grandma slice in Queens.
Going to Louie's I can always expect a great slice and not only is it consistent but the flavor is unmatched for what I've found so far on Long Island. If I'm craving pizza I'm going to Louie's.

This is one of those places where it doesn't need toppings to make the slice good, it's already very flavorful, but the toppings bring it to the next level.

Their service is excellent and calling over the phone is quick, and efficient.

My only gripe would be that the checkout area could use a bit more table space to place your box to add seasoning, but other than that, 10/10.

Highly recommended
We had a slice of grandma and a cheese
Then we had a Spring mix salad which is good for two

Then we had another slice of grandma which the dough is really good in texture

Finally found a great pizza place with no pork! Had grandma slice and it was really good. I usually left the crust but this one is very crunchy I ended up eating the whole thing. One specialty slice was $4.50. Best pizza around the hood, definitely will come back.

Found this place on Google after reading lots of great reviews. Never been to New York so this was the first stop after flying in. Apparently the owner knew we were tourists by the wide eyed looks on our faces! ğŸ¤£Immediately he says â€œWhere are you guys from?â€ Then after a brief conversation about the menu (all while he was helping other customers, cutting pizzas, making boxes, answering phones, taking payment, etc.) he convinced us to order a whole Grandma pizza. This man is a 5 star multi-tasker! We sat down and didnâ€™t wait too long before it was hot and freshly ready. The first bite was scorching hot but we simply could not put it down! The flavor was exquisite! Crispy on bottom, soft on top, light and flavorful toppings. It looks so simple but the flavors packed a punch! We ended up ordering a couple more slices to try other things and all were amazingly delicious! Thanks for the great food! Props to the cooks and owner who keep this place hopping.

It was better than any other pizza. My friend brought it to me and ate a piece, and it was so delicious that I went and packed it up myself. Hawaiian pizza. Light and savory. This is the first time since I came to the United States that I have had pizza that is not salty, not greasy, light and savory. The dough was moderately well cooked and crispy. To me, it was much more delicious than the pizzas that are said to be the top three pizzas in New York. Most customers ate pizza by the slice, and the whole pizza is a family size. Normally, one slice would be enough, but with this pizza, you can enjoy up to two slices. The ham as a topping is not salty and goes well with the cheese, so it doesn't drip with oil when you eat it with your hand. (Other places' pizzas dripped with oil as they cooled) It's light. Anyway. One-line summary. Trust me and try it. It's delicious. I think I'll be hooked for a while.

If you want authentic fresh homemade Italian with large portions at a very reasonable price, this is the place to go. Don't expect to get waited on. However, placing your order at the counter was easy. The seating is basic with diner like seating and a few tables but plenty of space adequate for a small family owned well run restaurant that does non-stop take-out as well. I had the linguine seafood, and it was awesome. A very large, filling bowl with homemade linguine pasta and plenty of seafood. A bargain at $15. We also ordered several other dishes (that were awesome) and a pizza as well.  We ended up taking the pizza home it was so large. I highly recommend you try their food. I know it will become one of your New York favorites.
Was not let down by others reviews of this place. Pizza was great. Ordered a Pepperoni Calzone that was delicious. Store owner was pleasant as well. Will be coming back.

Not only is Louie and his father our hometown hero - They continue to pump out consistently GREAT, TASTEY food at reasonable prices.  I ordered the Chicken Parm Hero today, and it a bargain considering its size.  I am lucky to have them local to me.

Their grandma pizza has genuinely stayed in my mind. Large size, great price, and delicious pizza. Their grandma pizza had pesto drizzle with red sauce, and a thick but crispy crust. On top of that, they delivered for free since I was staying in the area! Fast service too. I look forward to getting their food every time Iâ€™m in the area!

Been coming to Louieâ€™s Pizza in Elmhurst for over 7 years, and it never disappoints! The pizza is always on pointâ€”crispy crust, delicious sauce, and perfectly melted cheese. Whether you're grabbing a classic slice or one of their specialty pies, the quality is always top-notch. This place has only gotten better over the years, but they've stayed true to what makes them great. If you're in the area, Louieâ€™s is hands down my go-to pizzeria, and Iâ€™ll keep coming back! (My favorite is the MargheritağŸ¤ğŸ¾)
Great pizza. Chill vibe. Worth it. 4 slices, 2 bottles of soda, under $25.
